cheers.title: Cheers to 20 Years!
cheers.content: In 2004, an idea was hatched: simplify bill payments for the millions of bill payers throughout North America. To celebrate this idea, Paymentus welcomed someone who knows a thing or two about bills – Bill the Duck. For two decades, Bill has helped our clients keep their customer service afloat, get their ducks in a row and best serve those who have bills. Today, we’re excited to celebrate Bill and all those who have flown with us over these last 20 years. Here’s to greater successes to come!

meet_bill.title: Meet Bill
meet_bill.content: You’ve seen him at trade shows, on Instagram and maybe even on a pair of shoes or two. Get to know our fine-feathered friend and learn more about his dedication to making life easier for everyone – and everything – who has bills.

bill_bio.title: Name
bill_bio.content: William E. Billingsworth (But you can call him Bill)

bill_bio.title: Hobbies
bill_bio.content: Collecting trade show swag; traveling to exotic locations; taking bubble baths; changing colors; helping billers Bill Better!

bill_bio.title: Favorite Quote
bill_bio.content:
'Happiness is the richest thing we will ever own.'
— Donald Duck

journey.title: The Journey to Becoming Best in Class
journey.content: As Paymentus celebrates 20 years, join us in revisiting the milestones of our past that have laid the foundation for our future.

journey.title: Industry Accolades
journey.content: Paymentus has earned a host of industry awards and honors, including two Deloitte Canadian Technology Fast 50 Company in Ontario awards. Most recently, the Paymentus EBPP solution earned best-in-class honors from Aite-Novarica.

journey.title: Class-Leading Partners
journey.content: To expand our capabilities and best serve our clients, we’ve partnered with some of the biggest players in the world of payments and retail including PayPal, Amazon and Walmart.

journey.title: Strategic Growth
journey.content: Paymentus surrounds the world of billing and payment through its strategic acquisitions that have included Tele-Works, Inc. (TWI), Payveris and more. This growth was fueled in part by the investment of  leading financial investment firm Accel-KKR and the company’s 2021 IPO (NYSE: PAY).

journey.title: Product Innovations
journey.content: The Paymentus product suite gives customers more ways to pay through the introduction of wide-ranging services including the Instant Payment Network®, Secure Service® IVR and SMS, chatbot and more.

join.title: Join the Billebration
join.content: Watch this special event celebrating the clients, employees and partners that have helped us become a leading billing and payment provider. Paymentus CEO Dushyant Sharma shares his thoughts on the past 20 years and his vision for the next 20 and beyond.

contest.title: Billebration Photo Contest
contest.content:
If there’s one thing Bill loves it’s taking pictures with his fans (he is on Instagram after all). And now, those photos could win you some great prizes! Send us your photos with Bill and we’ll award our favorites in the following categories: Most Creative, Most Exotic Location, Funniest, Cutest, Most Pet Friendly.

Contest runs until (DATE). You can enter multiple photos, so send them in! You can also request a special 20th anniversary duck.

what_bill_means.title: What Bill Means to Us
quotes: “Bill reminds us that, while the work we do is very serious, we can always have fun. We can deliver for our clients and keep a smile on our face.”
“It’s pretty inspiring to see a flock of ducks flying in formation. Bill symbolizes that from our team to our clients, we’re all working together and moving in one direction.”

“In an interesting way, I think Bill’s greatest impact lies in humanizing our world. While we may work in a fast-paced, highly technical industry, Bill shows that there will always be a place for meaningful, personal connections.”
“Bill is Bill. When you see Bill at an event, you want to take him home. I love seeing team members bringing him on their trips and showing off their photos. It makes me smile every time.”

“It’s our job to deliver modern, inclusive and innovative billing and payment products that so many people rely on. But that doesn’t mean that we can’t work with a smile. And yes, that little duck always makes me smile.”

ask_bill.title: Ask Bill
ask_bill.content: After 20 years at the forefront of billing and payments, Bill has learned a thing or two about helping clients Bill Better®. Have a question for Bill or any of our payment experts? Send us an email with a question or topic for a future Bill Better® article and if we use it, you’ll gain some knowledge and a special prize.

follow.title: Follow Bill’s Instagram Adventures
follow.content: Ducks are social creatures and Bill loves taking this to a whole new level. Follow Bill’s adventures around the world by connecting with us on Instagram.
